mapper.select: SELECT * FROM ( SELECT rownum rn, a.* FROM (select s.*, c.*, cc.content cc_content from spot s, contents c, commoncodes cc where s.content_id = c.id and c.big_code = cc.big_code and c.small_code = cc.small_code order by content_id) a ) WHERE rn BETWEEN #{start} and #{end}
SELECT count(*) FROM spot s , contents c WHERE s.content_id = c.id

SELECT s.*, c.*, (SELECT content FROM CommonCodes cc WHERE c.big_code = cc.big_code AND cc.small_code = 999) AS bcode_content, (SELECT content FROM CommonCodes cc WHERE c.big_code = cc.big_code AND c.small_code = cc.small_code) AS scode_content, (SELECT content FROM Areas a WHERE c.area = a.area AND a.sigungu = 999) AS area_content, (SELECT content FROM Areas a WHERE c.area = a.area AND c.sigungu = a.sigungu) AS sigungu_content FROM spot s , contents c WHERE s.content_id = c.id AND s.content_id = #{content_id}
mapper.update: UPDATE contents SET is_deleted = 1 WHERE id = #{contentId}
UPDATE contents SET status = 1 WHERE id = #{contentId}

UPDATE contents SET area=#{area}, sigungu=#{sigungu}, big_code=#{big_code}, small_code=#{small_code}, title=#{title}, content=#{content}, status=#{status}, img1=#{img1}, img2=#{img2}, img3=#{img3}, address=#{address}, postcode=#{postcode}, mapx=#{mapx}, mapy=#{mapy}, email=#{email}, phone=#{phone}, homepage=#{homepage}, user_id=#{user_id}, updated_at=sysdate WHERE id = #{content_id}
